:root { --accent: #22D3EE; } body { font-family: sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } header { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 1rem; text-align: center; } main { padding: 1rem; } .hero { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 2rem; } .skills-container { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; } .skill-chip { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 1rem; } #projects { margin-top: 2rem; } #contact { margin-top: 2rem; text-align: center; } a:focus, button:focus { outline: 2px solid var(--accent); outline-offset: 2px; } @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) { * { animation: none !important; transition: none !important; } }
